}

<script type="text/javascript">
  function electionDelhi()
{
  var abc=$(".election").val();
  if(abc=="Delhi"||abc=="delhi"||abc=="New Delhi")
{
  $('#occasionMsg1').show();}
else
{
  $('#occasionMsg1').hide();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function occasionSpecial()
{
  var flagValue=$("#occasionFlag").val();
  if(flagValue=='true')
{
  var startDate=$('#startOccasionDate').val();
  startDate=startDate.split("/");
  var startDay=startDate[0];
  var startMonth=startDate[1];
  startDay=parseInt(startDay);
  startMonth=parseInt(startMonth);
  var endDate=$('#endOccasionDate').val();
  endDate=endDate.split("/");
  var endDay=endDate[0];
  var endMonth=endDate[1];
  endDay=parseInt(endDay);
  endMonth=parseInt(endMonth);
  var pickerDate=$('.dateValue').val();
  pickerDate=pickerDate.split("/");
  var pickerDay=pickerDate[0];
  var pickerMonth=pickerDate[1];
  pickerDay=parseInt(pickerDay);
  pickerMonth=parseInt(pickerMonth);
  if(startDay<=pickerDay&&pickerDay<=endDay&&startMonth<=pickerMonth&&pickerMonth<=endMonth)
{
  $("#occasionMsg").show();
  $(".occasionBtn").hide();
}
else
{
  $("#occasionMsg").hide();
  $(".occasionBtn").show();
}
}
}
</script>

The fast is considered to be symbolic of the love, well-being and the longevity of their husband. To celebrate this festival of love, online portals like Ferns N Petals brings to you KarwaChauth gifts online that will take the celebration to the next level.</p>
<p>With the growing popularity of the festival many married men are also observing fast on the occasion of KarwaChauth. You can send <a href="http://www.bookmyflowers.com/send-karwa-chauth-gifts-1-603-t.html">KarwaChauth gifts</a> to your spouse to make them feel simply out of the world. The online portal brings to you a wide array of sweets, gifts hampers and decorated puja thali too. In addition to this, our online portal has also got exclusive piece of jewellery too which can be the best Karwachauth gifts for wife. For mother-in-law who are finding it hard to look for a gift on the occasion can shop for exciting gift options too. They can either shop for beautiful decorative thalis which are the hottest selling products of the season and turns out to be great KarwaChauth Gifts for Bahu.</p>
<h2>Shop for a Variety of Bhaidooj Gifts Online</h2>
<p>Brother and Sister, the perfect duo have had a lot of fun together. They were there with each other during the happy and the sad times. The festival of Bhaidooj is a celebration of the unbreakable bond shared between them. As is customary, sisters offer their prayers early in the morning for the well-being and the longevity of their husband. In order to celebrate this festival, shop for a Bhaidooj gift online to let them know that you toolove them and truly cherish their companionship too. </p>
<p>Exchanging gifts between siblings is customary. If you are looking for a Bhaidooj gift for your sister, you can shop for some jewellery and accessory that she would appreciate or can even shop for a fresh bunch of flowers too. Our inventory is loaded with many excitingBhai Dooj gifts. You can chop for delectable sweet boxes, gift combos and hampers which will be the appropriate pick for the occasion. Surprise your brother with our assortment of international branded chocolates such as Ferrero Rocher, Toblerone, Snickers and other exciting chocolates too, send them as <a href="http://www.bookmyflowers.com/bhai-dooj-1-406-t.html">Bhaidooj gifts for brother</a> to make him feel special.
Our online portal gives you the opportunity to shop and send for Bhai Dooj Gifts to both national and international destinations with a click of the mouse</p>
<h2>Shop for Ethnic Diwali Gifts Online</h2>
<p>Diwali is one of the auspicious festival of India which is celebrated with a lot of fun and gaiety. People usually light up their homes with earthen diyas, lamps and lanterns to beautify their homes. Family get together and exchanging gifts with friends and family is an age old custom. To keep up with the ongoing custom and tradition, online portal like Ferns N Petals brings to you <a href="http://www.bookmyflowers.com/diwali">Diwali gifts online</a> thereby meeting the heavy time crunch.</p><p>The portal has come up with gift options suiting the taste and preference of most Indians. You will find that the portal is loaded with Diwali sweets, gift hampers and baskets to make your loved one feel special. All the gifts are delivered in the most gorgeous packaging. People can send Diwali gifts to friends, families and relatives with the help of our express delivery options.</p>
<p>If you are looking for something special for your family, you can easily shop for gift hampers and baskets. You can order Diwali gift hampers which has an assortment of gift items ranging from sweets, chocolates and other personalized gift items. The portal allows you to send online Diwali gifts to more than 350 destinations across the country.</p>
